<a name="TheResource.cascaded"></a>

### TheResource.cascaded
Cascade destroy condition

**Kind**: static property of [<code>TheResource</code>](#TheResource)  
**Example**  
```js
get cascaded () {
  return { User: (ref) => ({user: {$ref: ref}}) }
}
```
